To use items in battle,
please set them from
[c][DF1FB2FF]Party ＞ Combat Items[-][/c] first!
LOADING_LIST.sTitle: How to use items~ in battle~

LOADING_LIST.sContent:
You can use items
in the field from the
[c][DF1FB2FF]bottom right of the Menu[-][/c]!
LOADING_LIST.sTitle: How to use items~ in the field~

LOADING_LIST.sContent:
Character EXP can be gained by
winning battles or using [c][DF1FB2FF][EXP Potions][-][/c].

[c][DF1FB2FF][Cuisines][-][/c][/b] can be fed to
characters to enhance their stats!

You can travel to the locations
where the Gate is unlocked
at any time from the [c][DF1FB2FF][Map][-][/c]!

You can use the same gear to
[c][DF1FB2FF][enhance gear][-][/c] and increase its quality!

By casting a skill when another skill is in use,
you can activate a [c][DF1FB2FF][Chain][-][/c] and increase 
skill effects!

Adjust your gear and items
based on the enemy's Elemental weaknesses.
Pre-battle preparation is key to victory!

Go accept [c][DF1FB2FF][Commissions][-][/c]!
You can earn a lot of Ethers by
completing them.

[c][DF1FB2FF][Puni Ball][-][/c]
   Deals magical damage to a single enemy
[c][DF1FB2FF][Craft][-][/c]
   Deals physical damage to all enemies

Use [c][DF1FB2FF][Bombs][-][/c] to destroy
fallen trees or barrels on the field.

If you see an area that is sparkling near 
the water's edge,
use an [c][DF1FB2FF][Ice Bomb][-][/c] to create a path!

[c][DF1FB2FF][Carriages][-][/c] may pass by
at some specific locations.
They may drop something...

Check the [c][DF1FB2FF][Quests][-][/c] when
you don't know what to do!

There might be some tips!

There are some barrels ♪ on the field from
which you can hear a special sound.

There are 3 places in each territory that have 
this kind of barrels. Try to find them!

The Bag has a capacity.
Please keep an eye on the number of the Bag items.

You can get [Ethers]
from selling items.
[c][DF1FB2FF]※You won't get Ethers
if you discard items in the field.[-][/c]

You can use Coles to
expand Bag capacity.

[c][DF1FB2FF]※Each expansion increases the capacity by 50.[-][/c]

Main quests occur automatically
when the requirements are met.
You can get Coles and recipes from them!

Only 1 Side Quest can be accepted at the same time.
[c][DF1FB2FF]Key Quests[-][/c], that are prerequisites
for the Main Quest, should be prioritized.

Only 1 Character Quest can be accepted at the same time.

You need to own the character first
to challenge their quests.

Up to 5 commission quests can be accepted 
at the same time.

They are the best way to [c][DF1FB2FF]earn Ethers[-][/c]
as they can be cleared repeatedly.

Only 1 Special Quest can be accepted 
at the same time.
[c][DF1FB2FF]Each challenge consumes a special ticket.[-][/c]

You can win special rewards by clearing them.

The Certification Test is a commission which
you can challenge once every 24 hours.
[c][DF1FB2FF]It grants numerous Academy Points.[-][/c]
You'll be fighting powerful monsters, so don't 
let your guard down.

Gather alchemical ingredients from places
like grass or trees, or even rabbits or birds!
Some ingredients are only available in certain 
weather and time.

[c][DF1FB2FF]The Mini Map[-][/c] is in the upper right of 
the field screen.
You can conveniently check the locations of 
enemies and gathering spots from there!

Graphics quality can be adjusted from
[c][DF1FB2FF]"Settings" in the bottom left of the Menu[-][/c].

Try the Descent Battle to test your strength!
It can be accessed from [c][DF1FB2FF]Map ＞ Descent Battle[-][/c].
Some Descent Battles require a Descent Ticket!

Exchange your [c][DF1FB2FF]Descent Medals[-][/c] for
rare materials in the Descent Shop!
Descent Medals can be gained from the Descent Battle.
Go check [c][DF1FB2FF]Shop ＞ Event[-][/c]!

You can get a character's Limit Candies
by using them to clear their Character Quests.

The Limit Candies gained from gachas can be
used to exchange for other Limit Candies
from [c][DF1FB2FF]Shop ＞ Limit Candies[-][/c].
Go adventure with your favorite characters!

BATTLE_LIST.sContent:
You can gain powerful gears from [c][DF1FB2FF][gachas][-][/c]!
Go to the Academy to check the Gacha feature!

You can [c][DF1FB2FF]deal a huge amount of damage by
targeting the weakness[-][/c] of the monsters such as
the "monster that is overpowered by magical attacks"
or the "monster that is overpowered by the Fire Element"!!
Adjust your weapons and attack items based on the monster's weakness!

The gear will grow more powerful if you increase its level!
Besides, you can [c][DF1FB2FF][Break Through][-][/c] a gear by consuming a same gear.
Let's enhance the gears!!
